name: Extreme Car Driving
description:
In Extreme Car Driving, feel the thrill with extremely fast speed race on the track. Get into your muscle car and start the stunt and reach checkpoints in time to complete the level. This is the place where you can experience all kind of madness as a car racer. The action track is ready to challenge your vehicle in this unique adrenaline racing experience. But be careful while driving on race track, otherwise you will lose the mission by falling on the ground. So try to survive long to complete the levels.

Game Features:
1. Realistic car physics and flawless driving controls.
2. Upgrade super action cars of your wish.
3. Addictive and fast paced game play.
4. Realistic HD graphics.

So what are you waiting for? Get ready to drive astonishing sports cars on crazy tracks in Extreme Car Driving!
